**CONTRACT_ID**: `cb-497-11198634` **type**: `RFQ` (Request for Quotation) **department**: `Infrastructure Canada` **procurement_category**: `Service Produit` *Note: The original French `SRV` is not convertible; this is an invited bid rather than a public tender.* **short_summary**: `Legacy Systems Development and Support` **description**: `Infrastructure Canada (INFC) is requesting proposals for services to provide support and development of their legacy systems, as detailed in this RFP. The proposal must set out the means by which the technical, performance, time and other goals and objectives will be met. One (1) contract will be awarded as a result of the evaluation of the responses to this RFP. Neither the qualifying proposal that scores the highest points nor the one that contains the lowest cost will necessarily be accepted. INFC reserves the right to accept any proposal as submitted without prior negotiations.` **estimated_value**: The value of the contract will be determined after the evaluation of the proposals received. It is difficult to provide an estimate based on the given information; therefore, only the `unspsc` field can provide an idea of the services the winning bidder will provide, which may help in estimating the value. **date_posted**: `2024-05-10` **duration_in_months**: No specific duration is stated; infrastructure projects generally take longer than 12 months. **provinces**: An empty list, meaning the contract does not specify a particular province; the contract may be national, with services to be provided across the country. **tags**: A list containing categories to describe the nature of the RFP: `[
full_summary:
### Legacy Systems Development and Support

**Tender Details**

* **Tender Title**: Legacy Systems Development and Support
* **Reference Number**: cb-497-11198634
* **Solicitation Number**: INFC-2024/25-PS5384
* **Notice Publication Date**: May 10, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 3, 2024, 4:00 PM (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: To be determined
* **Expected Contract End Date**: To be determined

**Tender Description**

Infrastructure Canada (INFC) is seeking proposals for the development and support of legacy systems. The successful proposal will provide services to support and develop these systems, meeting the technical, performance, time, and other objectives outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

**Evaluation Criteria**

The proposals will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the requirements and expectations outlined in the RFP. The evaluation will consider technical, performance, time, and other objectives.

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

**Regions of Opportunity**

This tender is for services to be delivered across Canada, primarily in the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Contracting Entity**

* Name: Infrastructure Canada
* Address: 1100-180 KENT ST, OTTAWA, ONTARIO K1P 0B6, Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Email: procurement-approvisionnement@infc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: 343-576-3527

**Attachments**

The tender package can be downloaded from the following links:

* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Request for Proposal (RFP) (Updated)
* cpQPRessment (French Plan)
* Legacy Systems Development and Support
